CustomField.description: Indicates whether this status is equivalent to “Responded” (true) or not (false). Beginning with API version 39.0, at least one CampaignMemberStatus on each campaign must have a hasResponded value of true.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether this status is equivalent to “Responded” (true) or not (false). Beginning with API version 39.0, at least one CampaignMemberStatus on each campaign must have a hasResponded value of true.
CustomField.label: Has Responded
